summary: Adds Shock and Frost versions of the vanilla quest reward spell \"Flaming Familiar\"
descriptionHtml:
Made in response to a request by Galacticninja in the Bethesda Forums

Adds Shock and Frost versions of Flaming Familiar. Because the vanilla spell was a quest reward, i did not want to distribute these variants in the levelled lists. So instead, they get automatically added to your character as you go through a load door or fast travel, but only if you already know Flaming Familiar
author: Hypno
